name: The Great Leviathan
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 50 or more monsters from your hand, field, and/or GY, face-down. Cannot be Tributed, or used as material for a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Summon. Unaffected by other cards' effects. This card's Special Summon cannot be negated. When this card is Special Summoned: Your Life Points become 0, also, send all other cards you control to the GY. While you control this card, you cannot lose the Duel, also, you cannot Summon or Set cards. This card's ATK/DEF become the number of cards banished for its Special Summon x 1000. This card cannot declare an attack unless you banish the top 10 cards of your Deck face-down.
